RoleServices.summary: Provides services for managing roles and their associated permissions.

GetAllRolesAsync.summary: Retrieves all roles from the system.
GetAllRolesAsync.param: A token to monitor for cancellation requests.
GetAllRolesAsync.returns: An containing a list of roles.

GetAllRolesWithPermissionsAsync.summary: Retrieves all roles along with their associated permissions.
GetAllRolesWithPermissionsAsync.param: A token to monitor for cancellation requests.
GetAllRolesWithPermissionsAsync.returns: An containing a list of roles and their permissions.
